infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: Sport Buddy uses your location to show nearby sports events and help you find activities in your area. Your exact location is never shared with other users.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: Sport Buddy needs access to your camera to take profile photos and share event images with your sports community.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Sport Buddy needs access to your photo library to upload profile photos and event images. We only access the specific photos you choose to share.
